title: デビュー戦の後に・まず目指すは！

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah, hah...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: (It's smaller than the cheers I saw on TV that day, but still, there are so many spectators for a debut race!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: (The other girls running are high-level too...! Some are crying, everyone's serious!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: (The Twinkle Series... The Twinkle Series——)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: This is fun~!

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: That girl, Matikanetannhauser, right? Somehow... she feels different from the other Umamusume!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Mihono Bourbon, who debuted the other day, was amazing too. Aiming for the Triple Crown or something!

text_block_list.name: Spectator C
text_block_list.text: Really? Is Matikanetannhauser going for the Triple Crown route too? I hope she does!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: Yeah, next year's classic-grade races are gonna be heated!
In the spectator seats, faint expectations were born from the potential felt from Matikanetannhauser.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Make debut complete~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, right away, there's something I want to discuss.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well... the expectations the chairman placed on me before my debut, for some reason, have stayed in my heart all this time.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: There's the mystery of why for an ordinary Umamusume like me? But...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But, the fact that she said it again like that must mean something, I think!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So for now, in the classic-grade, I want to try everything I can!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: And, that's why first, I want to win the Classic Triple Crown!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Of course, of course I know it's not easy, of course!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The 'Satsuki Sho' where the fastest Umamusume wins, the 'Japanese Derby' where the luckiest Umamusume wins, the 'Kikuka Sho' where the strongest Umamusume wins...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Each one is a prestigious G1 race you can only challenge once in a lifetime, and it attracts Umamusume with incredible passion!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But still, even so, I really want it, the Triple Crown!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Because Triple Crown Umamusume are so sparkly and really cool!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Yeah, I want it. It might be difficult, but I still want it.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, what do you think? Trainer!
Even knowing it's a high wall to climb, as a trainer, there's no option but to support her.
choice_data_list: Yeah, let's do our best together!
Yeah, let's do our best together!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yay! Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Now that it's decided, first... it's time for warrior training!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: As I mentioned a bit earlier, I'm just not good enough as I am now.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So I want to boost my abilities in one go—gah-gah-gah!—and climb up to a level where I can reach the Triple Crown!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Specifically, well... I want to be able to finish within the top 5—like placing—in a G1 race!
Meanwhile, at that time—

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, ha...!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, ha... hoo. ...Ah, damn, the sky's so bright.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...Right about now, Tannhauser must have finished her debut.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Alright! One more set!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Whoa, Nature, you're at 100% motivation!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Hehe... 'Even Teio, who broke her leg, hasn't given up on the Kikuka Sho,' she said the other day.
First, aim for a placing in a G1 race. To achieve the Triple Crown next year, I want to prepare carefully!
